name: pre-commit
description: Run before committing code to ensure quality
script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "ğŸ” Running pre-commit checks..."

# Type checking
echo "  Type checking..."
pnpm type-check
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
  echo "  âŒ TypeScript errors found"
  exit 1
fi

# Linting
echo "  Linting..."
pnpm lint
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
  echo "  âŒ ESLint errors found"
  exit 1
fi

# Tests
echo "  Running tests..."
pnpm test --passWithNoTests
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
  echo "  âŒ Tests failed"
  exit 1
fi

echo "  âœ… All pre-commit checks passed!"
